Layer.UpdateCommand: %function(self) self:settext('0') if FUCK_EXE then if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_1) and not GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_2) then self:settext('Time: '..SecondsToMMSS( GAMESTATE:GetCurrentTrail(PLAYER_1):GetLengthSeconds() ) ) end if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_2) and not GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_1) then self:settext('Time: '..SecondsToMMSS( GAMESTATE:GetCurrentTrail(PLAYER_2):GetLengthSeconds() ) ) end if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_2) and GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(PLAYER_1) then self:settext('Time: '..SecondsToMMSS( GAMESTATE:GetCurrentTrail(PLAYER_1):GetLengthSeconds() ) ) end else self:settext(' ') end end

Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) if string.find(string.lower(PREFSMAN:GetPreference('DisplayAspectRatio')), '1.7777') or string.find(string.lower(PREFSMAN:GetPreference('DisplayAspectRatio')), '1.600') then self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X+310) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y-180) self:horizalign('left') self:diffuse(0,0,0,1) self:zoomto(300,24,0,0) self:cropright(0.6) self:fadeleft(0.1) else self:hidden(1) end end
